objective: Conduct comprehensive research to validate and enhance the Personal RAG Chatbot specifications with evidence-based insights
acceptance_criteria: Research findings must be evidence-based with citations to authoritative sources
All claims must have confidence scores and supporting data
Research must address gaps identified in specifications
Findings must be actionable for implementation decisions
Research must cover security, performance, and MoE effectiveness
External research claims must be verified and not taken at face value

context.business_domain: Personal knowledge management and research productivity
context.technical_scope: Local-first retrieval-augmented chatbot with MoE enhancements
key_requirements: MoE architecture for intelligent routing and reranking
quality_gates: All research claims must be evidence-based
Confidence levels must be explicitly stated
Sources must be authoritative and current
Findings must directly support specification decisions
context.business_impact: Research will validate technical decisions affecting product reliability, security, and user experience
